I love this game and for some reason the adept achievements are very rare so it's an easy way to get "rare" achievements. If you think you are a survivor main, but haven't really played killer yet, try killer at least 5 more times, you'll see what I mean by it's a stress reliever

As someone who has well over 400 hours in the game, I've developed my opinion of the game thoroughly. I would absolutely recommend this game, but you should be aware of some things...

1. The playerbase can be very toxic. You will see "L", "EZ", "You suck", and many more. Many, many more.
2. Some perks feel broken when first starting out. On the killer side, many survivors feel NOED is OP. On the survivor side, many killers feel Decisive Strike is OP.
3. Some strategies may make a game not fun for you, especially starting out. Killers can do strategies such as camping (staying in one area so no one else can do anything there, this usually happens around a hook to ensure a specific survivor dies. It can be countered with BT), slugging (downing all alive survivors so they cant pick each other up. Then the killer either hooks them all or let them bleed out. This can be countered with Unbreakable), or Snowballing (similar to slugging except they do it from the very beginning, hoping to end the game in a few minutes. Can be countered with unbreakable and gen-rushing).
Survivors can do things such as looping (this will happen every game. A good killer is harder to loop, but starting out this is frustrating), gen-rushing (trying to get done all the gens in a very fast time period, this can be countered using anti-gen perks like ruin), and can just be toxic (t-bagging, flashlight spamming, etc.)
4. There is a matchmaking system in DBD. Well, if you don't play for awhile, you will be put with newbies when you return. So for new players, this can make it difficult if you are stomped by good players. This happens more often to killer but does happen to survivors.
5. On each side, there is 1 thing that is annoying to deal with. For killers, it is moris. For survivors, it is keys. A mori allows the killer to kill someone after first hook. Usually you have to hook someone 3 times. This results in many people tunneling someone off first hook and just killing them. Killers rarely lose while using an ebony mori. Keys allow the survivors to open the hatch before it opens. This means that if the survivors do enough gens and find the hatch, they can just all leave without you knowing. It also means that if you close the hatch when there is one survivor left, they can just open it back up.

The game is very fun once you get good but it is also sweaty and a bit unbalanced, so be aware. Have a great day.

Игра как развивалась так и продолжает развиваться, лично для меня в положительную сторону.

Если вас эта игра не пугает то вэлком.

I've been hooked (ayyyyyy) on this game ever since its initial release, i remember i wasn't able to play it at first because it was only on Pc. I watched countless youtube videos of others playing this game and just kept wishing for the game to drop on consoles, i remember scrolling through amazon one day and found that there were pre orders available and had to get it instantly. this was also during the period when i should have been doing my research paper but nah this was more important to me. i've bought this game so many times Playstation, Xbox, Switch, multiple copies so that i can play with my friends. I love this game and i recently built my first Pc and boom another copy bought lol i have all of the dlc on playstation and i really hope that they can transfer over to my other platforms  with the cross progression system they are implementing soon but if not DBD can have all my money. loading times can be a hassle sometimes but usually ill scroll through social media while i wait no biggie for me. id love to play with anyone and everyone!

fun

Sometimes you get that adrenaline rush mid game that just wants you to continue and do more, but there are also some people you rarely get that just takes the fun out of it, but other than that is great.

The game is a simplistic hide and seek 1v4 juggernaut gametype. Only you can't kill the juggernaut. It's as basic as it gets, put things in the way of your enemy and try not to take damage while completing objectives. The cosmetics are okay but make you easier to spot and some people intend on being chased all game so costumes can help with that. 

All that being the case interaction with other people and their ego's for that matter really ruin this game. Not to mention people taking advantage of hacks that exist in multiple forms. A lot of people say you can't hack in this game but surprise surprise a lot of people are mentally unfit. 

That being said if you're looking to legitimately play a game that will make you feel shamelessly entitled and a community that will laugh at you for your frustration. Have fun. 

Personally. I play to ruin people's days. :D 
Although if you do dedicate more time and effort into learning this game than I have... I simply pity you. 
(To be fair I got most of my hours simping over some hoe who's wasting her life with some cripple invalid.)

Some friends and I were looking for a fun game we could play with one another online while using discord. This game was perfect. We were all on a team vs the killer, played by some random stranger, and loved to troll them and wreck them. When we aren't playing together, we all play as killer solo. Sometimes we all come together to play a 5 man custom game where one of us is killer. Very versatile game, very fun, and the more you play, the more you are rewarded. Highly recommend.

好玩，新兵屠夫游戏体验相当不错。个人平时主玩人类，但是偶尔闲下来也会享受一下屠夫视角的乐趣。17段做每日任务，技能槽都没开全，可以排一车队的3转血衣克隆人让你分不清谁是谁。抱一个人起来，三个绝地武士在钩子下等你。这种畅快淋漓的真剑对决可以说是《克隆战争》《西斯的复仇》级别的快感和游戏体验。此外游戏的交流系统设计丰富多彩。其中12两个表情的设计尤为精妙，不论对方是人类还是屠夫。即使不把想法组织成语言，文字。只要使用恰当，仅凭2个表情便便可把所有的心情想法传达给对方。更有些鬼灵精怪的玩家们，发挥出他们天马行空的想象力，通过将其排列组合成了1212，1122，1112，甚而是和下蹲，手电开关的滴答声等交错融合，编织成了一首轻松欢快有节奏感的交响曲， 直 击 屠 夫 的 心 肺。此外游戏还设有赛后友谊交流小窗口，可以让玩家们把对局中的懊悔，痛苦，愤怒，鄙夷，怨恨，诅咒这些美好的情感互相宣泄出来，并向彼此倾诉多么期望成为对方的血亲，成为相互生命中最重要的存在。缩小了玩家之间隔阂，拉近了人心之间的距离。
Fun
B_alls

This game has a steep learning curve, but once you get it, my god is this game fun.

I have my own personal gripes about this game, I think a killer or two are over powered, but this has got to be one of my favorite games. If you've ever wondered what it would be like living in a horror movie, this is the game to live that experience without being in any actual danger. This game still occasionally makes me scream in horror and I will feel my heart pounding after an intense game. I had no idea when I bought this game a year ago that there would be constant updates and DLC, and most recently there was cross play added so I can play with my console peasant friends. Keep it up devs. 

Oh and you could also play as the killer and murder your friends too, if you're into that kinda thing >:)
FUN

an overall fun game, but they need to stop coming out with new killers and balance out the old ones. The newer killers are at this stage not fun to play against. They are unbalanced and/or is boring. They are currently fixing older maps and updating them which have turned out to be a good change. I think in time, if they stop for a second and focus on what they already have, before churning out more shite, then this game will improve a lot. But this sounds very negative, it is fun playing both sides, and I do recommend it due to the hours I have spent on it and will spend on it.
